name: Pumpkin Madness
description:
It's Halloween and you need to save the baby pumpkins from the evil pumpkins. 

Control:
Move WASD
Shoot Space

Controller support: X-box Controller
Move Gamepad D-Pad 
Shoot Gamepad Right trigger

Gameplay:
When you go to a baby pumpkin it will start to jump to the center. If an evil pumpkin gets to a baby pumpkin the baby pumpkin will stop to move to the center and you need to go to it again. When all the baby pumpkins have been saved you need to escape through the center.
